price: São descendentes, uns dos outros. E Allah é Oniouvinte, Onisciente.
arabic: ذُرِّيَّةَۢ بَعۡضُهَا مِنۢ بَعۡضٖۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: dhurriyyatan baʿḍuhā min baʿḍin wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
